hero.title: Hi, I'm Guillermo Galvan
hero.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer specializing in Go, Python, and Cloud Architecture

about.title: About Me
content: I have been working as a Software Engineer for over 6 years, mastering Go, Python, and DevOps practices.
Throughout my career, I've actively worked with distributed systems, ensuring seamless integrations and performance optimization.
With over 5 years devoted to Go, I've crafted applications that emphasize sophisticated algorithms and data structures.
My toolkit includes big data technologies like AWS Glue and Athena, and I've orchestrated migrations through Dataflow from GCP.
My database expertise spans across various relational and NoSQL platforms, which has been pivotal in solving complex data-centric challenges.
While my backend proficiencies are extensive, I've also engaged in frontend projects, ensuring a holistic approach to software development.
My familiarity with Kubernetes, Docker, and cloud platforms, especially AWS and GCP, synergizes well with my DevOps experience.
